title.rendered: JOB POST: UX/UI Frontend HTML Designer at IIM Ahmedabad [Exp of 1-2 Years]: Apply by April 3

content.rendered:
Job applications are invited for UX/UI Frontend HTML Designer at IIM Ahmedabad for the year 2025. The last date of application is April 3.

Job Description

We are seeking a creative and detail-oriented Frontend HTML Designer to join our team. The ideal candidate will have a strong understanding of HTML, CSS, and responsive web design principles while also possessing an eye for design. This role combines UI/UX design capabilities with hands-on coding to create visually appealing, user-friendly web experiences.

Eligibility & Qualification

  • Requirements:
    • Education: Bachelor’s degree in web design, Graphic Design, Computer Science, or related field (or equivalent experience).
    • 1-2 years of relevant experience
  • Technical Skills:
    • Proficiency in HTML5 and CSS3.
    • Basic understanding of JavaScript (for dynamic elements and interactions).
    • Experience with responsive design frameworks like Bootstrap or Tailwind CSS.
    • Familiarity with design tools such as Figma, Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator, or Sketch.
    • Understanding of cross-browser compatibility and mobile-first design principles.
    • Ability to convert design mock-ups (PSD, Figma, Sketch) into clean, functional web pages.
    • Strong eye for detail, typography, color, and visual balance.
    • Understanding of user experience (UX) and ability to create intuitive interfaces.
    • Good communication and collaboration skills.
  • Preferred Skills (Optional):
    • Experience with front-end libraries or frameworks (e.g., React, Vue.js).
    • Knowledge of basic animation using CSS or JavaScript (GSAP, Scroll animations).
    • Understanding of SEO-friendly HTML structure and accessibility standards.
    • Familiarity with version control tools like Git.
    • Experience with designing for Content Management Systems (e.g., WordPress).
  • Age: Maximum 30 years

Work Location

IIM Ahmedabad Campus, Ahmedabad, Vastrapur, Ahmedabad.

How to Apply?

Interested candidates are required to share their updated resumes on career@iima.ac.in with subject line “Application for UX/UI Frontend HTML Designer” latest by April 03, 2025.

Key Responsibilities

  • Design and develop responsive web pages using HTML5, CSS3, and basic JavaScript.
  • Translate design mock-ups and wireframes into functional, pixel-perfect web interfaces.
  • Collaborate with design and development teams to enhance UI/UX across web applications.
  • Create visually engaging designs, including web banners, landing pages, and email templates.
  • Optimize web pages for speed, scalability, and mobile responsiveness.
  • Apply modern design principles to ensure a clean and intuitive user experience.
  • Stay updated with web design trends, tools, and best practices to deliver high-quality work.
  • Ensure compatibility of designs and code across multiple browsers and devices.

Click here for the official notification of UX/UI Frontend HTML Designer at IIM Ahmedabad.

Click here to download the brochure.
